FilterBookRequest.title: Filter Book Request
FilterBookRequest.description: Request body for filtering and paginating books. All fields are optional.

author_name.description: Filter books by author's full name (partial match).

genre_name.description: Filter books by genre name (partial match).

tag_name.description: Filter books by tag name (partial match).

year.description: Filter books by publication year. Must be a 4-digit integer.

per_page.description: Number of items to return per page.

StoreAuthorRequest.title: Store Author Request
StoreAuthorRequest.description: Request body for creating a new author

first_name.description: The first name of the author

last_name.description: The last name of the author

biography.description: A short biography of the author
biography.example: John Doe is a prolific writer known for his captivating sci-fi novels.

image_url.description: URL to the author's profile image

StoreBookRequest.title: Store Book Request
StoreBookRequest.description: Request body for creating a new Book. All fields are required as per validation rules.

synopsis.description: A brief summary or outline of the book's plot.
synopsis.example: A classic story about a young girl who discovers a hidden garden.

pages_amount.description: Total number of pages in the book

chapters_amount.description: Total number of chapters in the book

published_at.description: The date the book was first published (YYYY-MM-DD)

image_url.description: Optional URL to the book's cover image

author_ids.description: Optional array of author IDs to associate with the book

genre_ids.description: Optional array of genre IDs to associate with the book

StoreCommentRequest.title: Store Comment Request
StoreCommentRequest.description: Request body for creating a new comment on a book or review.

body.example: This is my insightful comment about the book!

StoreGenreRequest.title: Store Genre Request
StoreGenreRequest.description: Request body for creating a new genre.

name.description: The name of the new genre.

StorePostRequest.title: Store Post Request
StorePostRequest.description:
Request body for creating a new post.
 * Either 'book_id' must be provided in the request body, or the post must be created
 * in the context of a book route (e.g., /api/v1/books/{book_slug}/posts).

body.example: This book is incredibly captivating. Highly recommend it!

progress.description: The reading progress associated with the post (e.g., page number, percentage).

book_id.description:
The ID of the book this post is related to.
 * This field is required if the post is not created via a book-specific endpoint (e.g., /posts).
 * It is optional if the post is created via a book-specific endpoint (e.g., /books/{book_slug}/posts),
 * as the book ID will be inferred from the route.

StoreReviewRequest.title: Store Review Request
StoreReviewRequest.description:
Request body for creating a new book review.
 * Either 'book_id' must be provided in the request body, or the review must be created
 * in the context of a book route (e.g., /api/v1/books/{book_slug}/reviews).

rating.description: The rating given to the book, from 1 to 5.

comment.description: The text content of the review.
comment.example: This book was a truly immersive experience, I couldn't put it down!

book_id.description:
The ID of the book this review is for.
 * This field is required if the review is not created via a book-specific endpoint (e.g., /reviews).
 * It is optional if the review is created via a book-specific endpoint (e.g., /books/{book_slug}/reviews),
 * as the book ID will be inferred from the route.

StoreTagRequest.title: Store Tag Request
StoreTagRequest.description: Request body for creating a new tag.

name.description: The name of the new tag.

UpdateAuthorRequest.title: Update Author Request
UpdateAuthorRequest.description: Request body for updating an existing author. All fields are optional, providing only the ones to be updated.

first_name.description: The updated first name of the author

last_name.description: The updated last name of the author

nationality.description: The updated nationality of the author

biography.description: An updated biography of the author
biography.example: Janet Smith is a celebrated author known for her historical fiction.

image_url.description: Updated URL to the author's profile image

UpdateBookReadingProgressRequest.title: Update Book Reading Progress Request
UpdateBookReadingProgressRequest.description: Request body for updating a user's reading progress on a specific book.

pages_read.description: The current page number the user has read up to for this book.

UpdateBookRequest.title: Update Book Request
UpdateBookRequest.description: Request body for updating an existing Book. All fields are optional, and only provided fields will be updated.

title.description: The updated title of the book.

synopsis.description: An updated brief summary or outline of the book's plot.
synopsis.example: Arthur Dent's continuing misadventures across the universe.

isbn.description: The updated International Standard Book Number.

pages_amount.description: The updated total number of pages in the book.

chapters_amount.description: The updated total number of chapters in the book.

image_url.description: Optional URL to the book's new cover image.

author_ids.description: Optional array of author IDs to associate with the book. This will overwrite existing associations.

genre_ids.description: Optional array of genre IDs to associate with the book. This will overwrite existing associations.

UpdateBookTagRequest.title: Update Book Tag Request
UpdateBookTagRequest.description: Request body for updating a user's tag association for a specific book.

tag_id.description: The ID of the tag to associate with the book for the current user. Must be an existing tag ID.

UpdateCommentRequest.title: Update Comment Request
UpdateCommentRequest.description: Request body for updating an existing comment. All fields are optional.

body.description: The updated content of the comment.
body.example: This is my updated and improved comment!

UpdateGenreRequest.title: Update Genre Request
UpdateGenreRequest.description: Request body for updating an existing genre.

name.description: The new name for the genre.

UpdatePostRequest.title: Update Post Request
UpdatePostRequest.description:
Request body for updating an existing post. All fields are optional.
 * Either 'book_id' can be provided in the request body, or the post update
 * can occur in the context of a book route (e.g., /api/v1/books/{book_slug}/posts/{post_slug}).

body.description: The updated content of the post.
body.example: Just finished chapter 7, the plot twist was unexpected!

progress.description: The updated reading progress associated with the post (e.g., page number, percentage).

book_id.description:
The ID of the book this post is related to.
 * This field is optional. If provided, it must be an existing book ID.
 * If the update is via a book-specific endpoint (e.g., /books/{book_slug}/posts/{post_slug}),
 * the book ID will be inferred from the route.

UpdateReviewRequest.title: Update Review Request
UpdateReviewRequest.description: Request body for updating an existing book review. All fields are optional.

rating.description: The updated rating for the book, from 1 to 5.

comment.description: The updated text content of the review.
comment.example: Still a great book, but the ending felt a little rushed.

book_id.description: The ID of the book this review is for. This field is optional and typically not changed during an update. If provided, it must be an existing book ID.

UpdateTagRequest.title: Update Tag Request
UpdateTagRequest.description: Request body for updating an existing tag. All fields are optional.

name.description: The new name for the tag.

Author.title: Author
Author.description: Author model representing a creative writer or artist.

first_name.description: The first name of the author

last_name.description: The last name of the author

full_name.description: The concatenated full name of the author (first_name + last_name)

biography.description: A brief biographical summary of the author
biography.example: Joanne Rowling, most famously known as J.K. Rowling, is a British author, screenwriter, and producer best known for writing the Harry Potter fantasy series.

image_url.description: URL to the author's profile image or photograph

slug.description: Unique URL-friendly slug for the author (generated from full name)

created_at.description: Timestamp when the author record was created

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the author record was last updated

Book.title: Book
Book.description: Book model representing a published literary work.

id.description: The unique identifier of the book.

title.example: The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy

synopsis.description: A brief summary or outline of the book's plot and themes.
synopsis.example: Arthur Dent's journey through space after Earth is destroyed to make way for a hyperspace bypass.

isbn.description: The International Standard Book Number, a unique commercial book identifier.

pages_amount.description: The total number of pages in the book.

chapters_amount.description: The total number of chapters in the book.

published_at.description: The date when the book was originally published (YYYY-MM-DD).

slug.description: A URL-friendly, unique identifier for the book, derived from its title.

image_url.description: The URL to the book's cover image.

reading_progress.description: The current authenticated user's reading progress percentage for this book (0-100).

average_rating.description: The calculated average rating of the book, formatted to one decimal place.

created_at.description: The timestamp when the book record was created.

updated_at.description: The timestamp when the book record was last updated.

Comment.title: Comment
Comment.description: Comment model representing user feedback on commentable resources like books or posts.

user_id.description: The ID of the user who made the comment

commentable_id.description: The ID of the resource (e.g., book_id, post_id) the comment belongs to

commentable_type.description: The type of the resource the comment belongs to (e.g., 'App\\Models\\API\\V1\\Book', 'App\\Models\\API\\V1\\Post')

body.example: This is a great book! I really enjoyed it.

slug.description: Unique URL-friendly slug for the comment (generated from body)

related_to.description: The type of the resource the comment is related to (e.g., 'book', 'post')

created_at.description: Timestamp when the comment record was created

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the comment record was last updated

slug.description: Unique URL-friendly slug for the genre (generated from name)

created_at.description: Timestamp when the genre record was created

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the genre record was last updated

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the post record was last updated

Review.title: Review
